summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 24 December to end of Friday 24 December GMT
description: Another change in air flow is predicted for Christmas Eve which will bring air from Spain and western France.  This should result in little pollution import.<br/><br/>The weather is forecast to be cloudy with rain in the afternoon and evening.<br/><br/>Air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
